entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
